title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: When attempting to revert a file in the java editor, it takes significantly longer compared to simply closing and reopening the file.
EB: This seems odd, since reverting the file contents should not take more time than closing and reopening the file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a file in the java editor. 2. Make some changes to the file. 3. Try to revert the file using the revert option in the editor. Compare the time it takes to revert with the time it takes to simply close and reopen the file.
